<Link id="l00268" /><CodeLine lineNumber="268"><span class="doxyHighlight">            &#91;&amp;&#93;(<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/jitlink/linkgraph">LinkGraph</a> &amp;LG, <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/jitlink/symbol">Symbol</a> &amp;Sym) -&gt; <a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/jitlink/sectionrangesymboldesc">SectionRangeSymbolDesc</a> &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00269" /><CodeLine lineNumber="269"><span class="doxyHighlight">              </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (Sym.<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/jitlink/symbol/#a37941163af977712e6ae68591327a0ad">getName</a>() != </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">nullptr</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> &amp;&amp;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00270" /><CodeLine lineNumber="270"><span class="doxyHighlight">                  &#42;Sym.<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/jitlink/symbol/#a37941163af977712e6ae68591327a0ad">getName</a>() == ELFGOTSymbolName)</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00271" /><CodeLine lineNumber="271"><span class="doxyHighlight">                </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (</span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">auto</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> &#42;GOTSection = <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/support/md5-cpp/#ad96b7cf3182ce2ba85e5a7a93b12c441">G</a>.findSectionByName(</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00272" /><CodeLine lineNumber="272"><span class="doxyHighlight">                        <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/jitlink/x86-64/gottablemanager/#acb719e61ecaa74da5002a643f6a84695">x86&#95;64::GOTTableManager::getSectionName</a>())) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00273" /><CodeLine lineNumber="273"><span class="doxyHighlight">                  GOTSymbol = &amp;Sym;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00274" /><CodeLine lineNumber="274"><span class="doxyHighlight">                  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">return</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> &#123;&#42;GOTSection, </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">true</span><span class="doxyHighlight">&#125;;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00275" /><CodeLine lineNumber="275"><span class="doxyHighlight">                &#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00276" /><CodeLine lineNumber="276"><span class="doxyHighlight">              </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">return</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> &#123;&#125;;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00277" /><CodeLine lineNumber="277"><span class="doxyHighlight">            &#125;);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00278" /><CodeLine lineNumber="278"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00279" /><CodeLine lineNumber="279"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Try to attach &#95;GLOBAL&#95;OFFSET&#95;TABLE&#95; to the GOT if it&#39;s defined as an</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00280" /><CodeLine lineNumber="280"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// external.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00281" /><CodeLine lineNumber="281"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (</span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">auto</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> Err = DefineExternalGOTSymbolIfPresent(G))</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00282" /><CodeLine lineNumber="282"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">return</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> Err;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00283" /><CodeLine lineNumber="283"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00284" /><CodeLine lineNumber="284"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// If we succeeded then we&#39;re done.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00285" /><CodeLine lineNumber="285"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (GOTSymbol)</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00286" /><CodeLine lineNumber="286"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">return</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/error/#a4dfd0813c3d0e0a30439b5a3e9196b59">Error::success</a>();</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00287" /><CodeLine lineNumber="287"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00288" /><CodeLine lineNumber="288"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Otherwise look for a GOT section: If it already has a start symbol we&#39;ll</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00289" /><CodeLine lineNumber="289"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// record it, otherwise we&#39;ll create our own.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00290" /><CodeLine lineNumber="290"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// If there&#39;s a GOT section but we didn&#39;t find an external GOT symbol...</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00291" /><CodeLine lineNumber="291"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (</span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">auto</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> &#42;GOTSection =</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00292" /><CodeLine lineNumber="292"><span class="doxyHighlight">            G.findSectionByName(<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/jitlink/x86-64/gottablemanager/#acb719e61ecaa74da5002a643f6a84695">x86&#95;64::GOTTableManager::getSectionName</a>())) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00293" /><CodeLine lineNumber="293"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00294" /><CodeLine lineNumber="294"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Check for an existing defined symbol.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00295" /><CodeLine lineNumber="295"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">for</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (</span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">auto</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> &#42;Sym : GOTSection-&gt;symbols())</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00296" /><CodeLine lineNumber="296"><span class="doxyHighlight">        </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (Sym-&gt;<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/jitlink/symbol/#a37941163af977712e6ae68591327a0ad">getName</a>() != </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">nullptr</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> &amp;&amp; &#42;Sym-&gt;<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/jitlink/symbol/#a37941163af977712e6ae68591327a0ad">getName</a>() == ELFGOTSymbolName) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00297" /><CodeLine lineNumber="297"><span class="doxyHighlight">          GOTSymbol = Sym;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00298" /><CodeLine lineNumber="298"><span class="doxyHighlight">          </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">return</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/error/#a4dfd0813c3d0e0a30439b5a3e9196b59">Error::success</a>();</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00299" /><CodeLine lineNumber="299"><span class="doxyHighlight">        &#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00300" /><CodeLine lineNumber="300"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00301" /><CodeLine lineNumber="301"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// If there&#39;s no defined symbol then create one.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00302" /><CodeLine lineNumber="302"><span class="doxyHighlight">      SectionRange SR(&#42;GOTSection);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00303" /><CodeLine lineNumber="303"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (SR.empty())</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00304" /><CodeLine lineNumber="304"><span class="doxyHighlight">        GOTSymbol =</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00305" /><CodeLine lineNumber="305"><span class="doxyHighlight">            &amp;G.addAbsoluteSymbol(ELFGOTSymbolName, orc::ExecutorAddr(), 0,</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00306" /><CodeLine lineNumber="306"><span class="doxyHighlight">                                 <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/jitlink/#abee99c9c75d23a0304e5e58e3128a55fac43e0fd449c758dab8f891d8e19eb1a9">Linkage::Strong</a>, <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/jitlink/#adb322dc6826cf005531ccfdf666260fda509820290d57f333403f490dde7316f4">Scope::Local</a>, </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">true</span><span class="doxyHighlight">);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00307" /><CodeLine lineNumber="307"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">else</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00308" /><CodeLine lineNumber="308"><span class="doxyHighlight">        GOTSymbol =</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00309" /><CodeLine lineNumber="309"><span class="doxyHighlight">            &amp;G.addDefinedSymbol(&#42;SR.getFirstBlock(), 0, ELFGOTSymbolName, 0,</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00310" /><CodeLine lineNumber="310"><span class="doxyHighlight">                                <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/jitlink/#abee99c9c75d23a0304e5e58e3128a55fac43e0fd449c758dab8f891d8e19eb1a9">Linkage::Strong</a>, <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/jitlink/#adb322dc6826cf005531ccfdf666260fda509820290d57f333403f490dde7316f4">Scope::Local</a>, </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">false</span><span class="doxyHighlight">, </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">true</span><span class="doxyHighlight">);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00311" /><CodeLine lineNumber="311"><span class="doxyHighlight">    &#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00312" /><CodeLine lineNumber="312"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00313" /><CodeLine lineNumber="313"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// If we still haven&#39;t found a GOT symbol then double check the externals.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00314" /><CodeLine lineNumber="314"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// We may have a GOT-relative reference but no GOT section, in which case</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00315" /><CodeLine lineNumber="315"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// we just need to point the GOT symbol at some address in this graph.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00316" /><CodeLine lineNumber="316"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (!GOTSymbol) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00317" /><CodeLine lineNumber="317"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">for</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (</span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">auto</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> &#42;Sym : G.external&#95;symbols()) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00318" /><CodeLine lineNumber="318"><span class="doxyHighlight">        </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (&#42;Sym-&gt;<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/jitlink/symbol/#a37941163af977712e6ae68591327a0ad">getName</a>() == ELFGOTSymbolName) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00319" /><CodeLine lineNumber="319"><span class="doxyHighlight">          </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">auto</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> Blocks = G.blocks();</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00320" /><CodeLine lineNumber="320"><span class="doxyHighlight">          </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (!Blocks.empty()) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00321" /><CodeLine lineNumber="321"><span class="doxyHighlight">            G.makeAbsolute(&#42;Sym, (&#42;Blocks.begin())-&gt;getAddress());</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00322" /><CodeLine lineNumber="322"><span class="doxyHighlight">            GOTSymbol = Sym;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00323" /><CodeLine lineNumber="323"><span class="doxyHighlight">            </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">break</span><span class="doxyHighlight">;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00324" /><CodeLine lineNumber="324"><span class="doxyHighlight">          &#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00325" /><CodeLine lineNumber="325"><span class="doxyHighlight">        &#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00326" /><CodeLine lineNumber="326"><span class="doxyHighlight">      &#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00327" /><CodeLine lineNumber="327"><span class="doxyHighlight">    &#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00328" /><CodeLine lineNumber="328"></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00371" /><CodeLine lineNumber="371"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Construct a JITLinker and run the link function.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00372" /><CodeLine lineNumber="372"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Add a mark-live pass.</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00380" /><CodeLine lineNumber="380"></CodeLine>
